articles.description: Weekes was a solid batsman. He particularly had a very good stroke through the covers when he used to bend his knee and hit. I used to always field in the covers. I had the best view.
articles.content:
Everton Weekes was a prolific batsman and got runs wherever he played. Against India he batted at another level—seven centuries in 10 Tests.
When I went to the West Indies in 1953 he played against … [+3304 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Mourinho fumes at 'office' ref after latest VAR row in Spurs loss - ESPN India
articles.description: "I think the referee should always be the man on the pitch and the man in the office should support and assist," Mourinho said of the incident.
articles.content: Tottenham Hotspur manager Jose Mourinho questioned the point of having referees on the pitch and said VAR was bad for the game after his side were victims of a controversially disallowed equaliser in… [+2512 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi has the key to Barcelona, not Quique Setien - Julien Laurens | ESPN FC - ESPN UK
articles.description: ESPN FC’s Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens discuss Barcelona’s draw with Atletico Madrid and debate how Quique Setien can get the best out of Antoine Griezman...
